base_description: Round white bottle with pump dispenser.
part_description: Consists of a cylindrical body and a pump top. The pump includes a nozzle and a push-down mechanism positioned centrally on the lid.
internal_interaction_description: The pump mechanism connects to a tube inside the bottle, allowing liquid to be drawn up and dispensed when the top is pressed. The nozzle directs the flow outward.
external_interaction_description: When pressed, the pump dispenses liquid onto hands or another surface. The bottle can be refilled by unscrewing the pump top. It is placed on flat surfaces for stability.
